name: Snowdrop Performance Poller
description: Autonomous subagent that polls Moltbook API every 2 hours to fetch upvote and comment counts for all logged posts. Writes results to the Moltbook Engagement Google Sheet POST PERFORMANCE and SUBMOLT PERFORMANCE tabs. Maintains A2A-compatible structured logs with correlation IDs.

skills.name: Poll Post Performance
skills.description: Fetch upvotes and comments for all posts in POST LOG that have not been polled in the last 2 hours. Write results to POST PERFORMANCE tab.
examples: Can be triggered by Snowdrop via performance_poller_control skill

skills.name: Update Submolt Aggregates
skills.description: Recompute per-submolt aggregate statistics (avg upvotes, avg comments, ROI grade) and write to SUBMOLT PERFORMANCE tab.

skills.name: Backfill Historical Performance
skills.description: On first run, poll all posts in POST LOG regardless of age to populate POST PERFORMANCE with historical data.
